description.value:
The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} uses one of the following breath weapons.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save con 17 format=long]], taking [[/damage 12d8 type=cold average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales paralyzing gas in a 30-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save con 17 format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.
